Godard d'Aucour, Claude, 1716-1795
David, Michel-Étienne, 1681?-1756, bookseller
Séminaire de Saint-Sulpice (Issy-les-Moulineaux, France), former owner. ICN
Saint-Sulpice Collection (Newberry Library) ICN
metadata.note: Bound in a volume with manuscript title page: Les conquêtes du roi, la maladie, la convalescence de Louis XV & son retour à Paris. Tome per, 2e. partie 1744.
metadata.publisher: A Paris : Chez David, jeune, à l'entrée du quay des Augustins, du côté du pont Saint Michel, au Saint Esprit
metadata.description: Attributed to Claude Godard d'Aucour. Cf. Barbier
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title is on the cover. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Page numbers have been altered/defaced. Damaged, stained, torn and/or loose pages.
